scripts.render-build: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npx nuxt prepare && npm run build
scripts.render-build-safe: npm install --legacy-peer-deps --ignore-scripts && npx nuxt prepare && npm run build
scripts.build-render: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && npx nuxt prepare && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' npx nuxt build
scripts.build-memory: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=2048' npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=2048' npx nuxt prepare && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=2048' npx nuxt build
scripts.build-minimal: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=1024' npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=1024' npx nuxt prepare && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=1024' npx nuxt build
scripts.build-simple: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npx nuxt prepare && npx nuxt build
scripts.build-ultra-minimal: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' npm install --legacy-peer-deps && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' npx nuxt prepare && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' npx nuxt build
scripts.build-no-postinstall: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' npm install --legacy-peer-deps --ignore-scripts && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' npx nuxt prepare && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' npx nuxt build
scripts.build-direct: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' npm install --legacy-peer-deps --ignore-scripts && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' ./node_modules/.bin/nuxt prepare && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' ./node_modules/.bin/nuxt build
scripts.build-node: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' npm install --legacy-peer-deps --ignore-scripts && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' node ./node_modules/.bin/nuxt prepare && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' node ./node_modules/.bin/nuxt build
scripts.build-chmod: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' npm install --legacy-peer-deps --ignore-scripts && chmod +x ./node_modules/.bin/nuxt && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' ./node_modules/.bin/nuxt prepare && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' ./node_modules/.bin/nuxt build
scripts.build-bash: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=512' npm install --legacy-peer-deps --ignore-scripts && bash -c 'NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=512" ./node_modules/.bin/nuxt prepare' && bash -c 'NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=512" ./node_modules/.bin/nuxt build'
